post.body: yeah we always thing that in the off-season - it's just when September comes around things go wrong :-(
poor you. Ever thought of using CAPS LOCK? :-)
Hi Cath! Yes it has been a while. I live up in Northumberland now, so won't run into you at Victoria any more! Hope u r well?
Good luck back in MSN! Be interested to know what you're up to over there
with your love of all things Powershell this Channel 9 video might interest you... http://bit.ly/G8st
thx 4 the link to my MSDN article. I'm hoping to open my code up to everyone once it's a bit more robust. More to come soon!
sad to say goodbye to my 10 year old Clio, but happy to have a car that might start every time in the frozen North!
Up early watching the cricket when I should be cleaning out the old car (getting a new one today hopefully)
excited about the Mets getting both K-Rod and JJ Putz. And the Mariners get Endy. Roll on April!
supposedly my GPU is running at 278.6F which is a little hot :-( Looks like I'll need a replacement graphics card soon
realised why my PC was playing up - the fan on my graphics card was fried :-( Hoping a bit of fresh air might make it last a little longer
Nice Channel 10 video showing some of the new features in our latest Live Search release: http://bit.ly/aFut
completely unsurprised that the Seahawks manage to lose once again
Live Location: Crescent Avenue, Hexham, Northumberland, England
My MSDN Blog: Linking Fire Eagle and Twitter http://tinyurl.com/5ubt39
Barack Obama has a Zune! - http://tinyurl.com/5tvzpr
it's officially colder in the North - the view from my office window: http://twitpic.com/q1sq
looks like we missed the worst of it, but it's snowing again right now
Live Location Crescent Avenue, Hexham, Northumberland, England
My MSDN Blog: SUPER-FAST MSDN http://tinyurl.com/57uljl
the lucky chilli worked again as the mighty Yeltz come from behind to win 2-1
Having a quiet pint with my paper after a lucky 5 bean chilli in Spoons. Lovely!
back home; shopping done; sore hands from heavy plastic bags; ready for holidays to begin properly now!
In Starbucks preparing for a long day Xmas shopping in Newcastle
Finally done for Xmas after completing a very long list of tasks. Now all I've got to do is start my Xmas shopping :-(
3 more working days until Xmas and I might just get all my code library written in time
